title: No charges for Louisiana police who shot Alton Sterling: official
text:
No charges for Louisiana police who shot Alton Sterling: official Tuesday, March 27, 2018 - 02:05 
Louisiana will not charge two police officers for the fatal 2016 shooting of Alton Sterling, one of series of killings of black men that sparked protests across the United States, because evidence showed they acted properly, according to Louisiana Attorney General Jeff Landry on Tuesday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
